General.Name: Shenzhen Clou Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Clou Electronics Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides equipment and solutions for smart grid, energy storage, new energy vehicle charging and operation, and integrated energy services in China and internationally. The company offers smart meters, intelligent power distribution and electrical equipment, precision instrument/intelligent detection products, smart logistics/smart manufacturing products, battery compartment systems, energy storage bidirectional converters, energy management systems, and energy storage full life cycle advanced management systems. It also provides charging infrastructure and smart cloud platform solutions; and charging station construction and operation, new energy vehicle operation, equipment integration and maintenance, and building and park operation services, as well as operation and maintenance services for energy storage power stations. In addition, the company offers charging infrastructure; construction and operation of charging station; operation of new energy vehicles; equipment integration and maintenance; engineering procurement construction services. Shenzhen Clou Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
